snippet: COHEN--Robert A.,died on March 30, 2016 of lung cancer. Born in Boston, Massachusetts, on April 13, 1932, to Evelyn and Julian Cohen, educated at the Roxbury Latin School, Harvard University, and Columbia Business School. He served in the United States Army from 1955 - 1957, and afterward ran Blackstone Mills, the family upholstery fabric manufacturing company. He moved to Longboat Key in 1996. Surviving are his wife, Laurel; his three nieces, Judith Cohen, Nancy Cohen, and Sandy Cohen; and one grandniece, Tamar Pahigian. 1/3
lead_paragraph: COHEN--Robert A.,died on March 30, 2016 of lung cancer. Born in Boston, Massachusetts, on April 13, 1932, to Evelyn and Julian Cohen, educated at the Roxbury Latin School, Harvard University, and Columbia Business School. He served in the United States Army from 1955 - 1957, and afterward ran Blackstone Mills, the family upholstery fabric manufacturing company. He moved to Longboat Key in 1996. Surviving are his wife, Laurel; his three nieces, Judith Cohen, Nancy Cohen, and Sandy Cohen; and one grandniece, Tamar Pahigian. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COHEN, ROBERT A.
